SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: NauticalChart
SimEntity.Comment:
This object is used to collect and transmit all information that one could derive from a Nautical Chart. Accordingly, this graph includes adapter functionality (e.g. RegisterTargetByAdapter) to allow relay objects to register through the chart.
The primary component of the chart is an array of diskit.AStarZoneGeometry which define the navigatable zones of the water space.
Additionally, buoys, perimeter zones, piers, etc, should all pass through this class to allow other event graphs the opportunity to extract the information they need from the chart.
Extends SMALMover3D to have the same reset/rerun response

Parameter.name: navigableWaterZones
Parameter.Comment: The collection of zones that represent general areas of navigable water

Parameter.name: waterFrontAreas
Parameter.Comment: The areas of the waterfront that can be used by crafts for launching or water access

StateVariable.name: harborMap
StateVariable.Comment: The diskit.AStarZoneMap created using the specified zones

Event.name: RegisterAStarZoneMap
Event.Comment: The event which publishes all nautical chart information to the listeners of this object

Argument.name: chart
Argument.Comment: The navigatable water, in AStar search format

Argument.name: recipient
Argument.Comment: intented recipient of the Init event
